text: the number of workloads is growing
exponentially each with different
characteristics and infrastructure needs
the problem is that limited choices make
it difficult for customers to run these
workloads while optimizing performance
and cost luckily there's a solution
AWS listened to their customers and
partnered with AMD to deliver more
choices to right-size workloads
while lowering compute in memory costs
by up to 10% over comparable instances
Amazon ec2 instances are for custom
built first and second-generation AMD
epic processors and the AWS nitro system
they are available in the compute
optimize c5 a general-purpose m5 a
general-purpose burstable t3a and memory
optimized r58 instances families the
nitro systems dedicated hardware and
software provides instances with high
availability and security while reducing
virtualization overhead migration to
these new instances is seamless
customers can easily migrate workloads
currently running on existing ec2
instances to the new AMD based variants
with little to no modification these
instances are available in the same
sizes and offer application
compatibility with the c-5m 5 t3 and r5
instances so customers can start using
them just like their other easy two
instances AMD and AWS are proud to be
able to offer cost-effective options
that add to the broadest and deepest
portfolio of ec2 instances a few lines
of code can save you 10% discover what
AMD epic based ec2 instances can do for
your bottom line
[Music]
